title: Assessment 1
text:
I am a Year 1 Applied Computing student at Singapore Institute of Technology (SIT), transitioning from an Accountancy background. I graduated from Temasek Polytechnic with a Diploma in Accountancy.
In my free time, I enjoy reading at cafes and journaling while enjoying food and drinks. My favourite drink is iced matcha latte.

title: Internship
text:
Final Year Internship | Big Four Accounting Firm
Key Responsibilities & Learnings:

Conducted comprehensive audits during peak and non-peak periods
Gained practical understanding of financial systems and compliance
Recognized the critical importance of data accuracy and manipulation
Developed strong analytical and attention-to-detail skills

title: Internship
text:
Career Pivot

Why I Switched to Computing
My Deloitte experience revealed how technology, particularly data manipulation through code, was transforming traditional audit processes. This insight sparked my interest in computing and led me to pursue Applied Computing at SIT.

title: Reflection on the use of GENAI
text:
One GenAI tool that I regularly use is DeepSeek, which has become an integral part of my academic workflow as an Applied Computing student.


Several key features make DeepSeek particularly valuable for my studies:
1. Unlimited Image/Screenshot Uploads
This functionality is exceptionally useful when troubleshooting coding errors. I can simultaneously upload screenshots of both my code and the error messages, providing context that enables more accurate and helpful responses from the AI.
2. Multiple File Upload Capability
The ability to upload entire lecture notes or project files allows me to seek clarification on complex topics or get assistance with organizing my study materials. This feature transforms DeepSeek into a personalized study assistant that understands my specific course content.
3. Cost-Free Accessibility
As a student with limited disposable income, having access to a powerful, free GenAI tool is invaluable. DeepSeek provides sophisticated AI assistance without financial barriers, making advanced technology accessible for learning and problem-solving.



Using DeepSeek has enhanced my ability to: - Troubleshoot coding problems more efficiently - Clarify complex computing concepts - Organize and synthesize information from lectures - Develop better study habits through structured assistance
This experience has shown me how thoughtfully designed GenAI tools can democratize access to knowledge and support diverse learning needs in higher education.

title: Data Visualisation
text: This visualization was created from survey data collected for my Critical Thinking project. We gathered responses from individuals regarding their satisfaction with ReadyTalent, the platform used by SIT students to search for internship opportunities. The data visualization was created using Microsoft Excel to analyze and present the survey findings.

title: Data Visualisation
text: This visualization was created from survey data collected for my Critical Thinking project. We gathered responses from individuals regarding their satisfaction with ReadyTalent, the platform used by SIT students to search for internship opportunities. The data visualization was created using Microsoft Excel to analyze and present the survey findings.
